name: bmbench

scripts.copyx0: cp *.js *.ts *.html LICENSE favicon.ico dist/ && mkdir dist/test && cp test/*.js test/*.html dist/test/
scripts.copyxx: cp *.js *.ts *.html LICENSE favicon.ico dist/ && mkdirp -p dist/src/test && cp -r test/*.ts dist/src/test && cp src/test/*.html dist/test/
scripts.build: npm run build:one && npm run copy

keywords: Benchmarks, CPU benchmarks, Performance, programming languages
author: Marco Vieth
